location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Newnham, Acting Chief Secretary to the Government, Secret Department, Bombay to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Resident that the Governor of Bombay approves of his decision to present several gifts to the Shaikhs of Khatiffe [Al-Qaṭīf], along with his decision to dispatch a broker to that place to assist Captain Sadleir, but notes the appointment should only be temporary.
